quote: If you try, you might get exactly what you want. If you don't, you don't. – Unknown
fact: Los Angeles` full name `El Pueblo de Nuestra Senora la Reina de Los Angeles de Porciuncula` is reduced to 3.63% of its size in the abbreviation `L.A.`.
